arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian

Class PersistenceHamiltonianConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian.PersistenceHamiltonianConfig

  • class PersistenceHamiltonianConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for PersistenceHamiltonian parameters.

      (package private) double[] vector
      Movement target vector.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PersistenceHamiltonianConfig

        PersistenceHamiltonianConfig(PottsLocation location,
                             double lambda,
                             java.util.EnumMap<Enums.Region,java.lang.Double> lambdasRegion,
                             double decay,
                             double threshold)
        Creates parameter configuration for PersistenceHamiltonian.
        Parameters:
        location - the associated location instance
        lambda - the lambda multiplier
        lambdasRegion - the map of lambda multiplier for regions
        decay - the decay fraction
        threshold - the volume threshold

    • Method Detail

      • getDecay

        public double getDecay()
        Gets the decay value.
        Returns:
        the decay value

      • getDisplacement

        public double[] getDisplacement(int x,
                                int y,
                                int z,
                                int change)
        Gets the updated displacement of the center.

        Displacement vector is stored until this method is called again.

        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the changed voxel
        y - the y position of the changed voxel
        z - the z position of the changed voxel
        change - the direction of change (add = +1, remove = -1)
        Returns:
        the displacement unit vector

      • getDisplacement

        public double[] getDisplacement(int x,
                                int y,
                                int z,
                                int change,
                                Enums.Region region)
        Gets the updated displacement of the center of a region.

        Calling this method does not update the stored displacement vector.

        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the changed voxel
        y - the y position of the changed voxel
        z - the z position of the changed voxel
        change - the direction of change (add = +1, remove = -1)
        region - the region
        Returns:
        the displacement unit vector

      • getLambda

        public double getLambda()
        Gets the lambda value.
        Returns:
        the lambda value

      • getLambda

        public double getLambda(Enums.Region region)
        Gets the lambda value for the region.
        Parameters:
        region - the region
        Returns:
        the lambda value

      • getVector

        public double[] getVector()
        Gets the direction unit vector for the location.

        If the location has changed since the last call to this method, the vector is updated to be between the previous direction and the most recent displacement direction.

        Returns:
        the direction unit vector
